actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution recommending elimination of voter registration on the basis of political party affiliation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the States should pass laws that: (1) prohibit voter registration which is based on political party affiliation; and (2) ensure that voter registration is conducted through the date of the election involved (or at least not terminated earlier than ten days before each election).

titles.title: A concurrent resolution recommending elimination of voter registration on the basis of political party affiliation, and for other purposes.
